data.title: Barun Sobti: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: barun sobti: Check out the list of all barun sobti movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest barun sobti news on Times of India.
data.text:
Filmmakers should bet on actors too, not just stars: Hasleen Kaur

TNN / Mar 01, 2024, 09:00 (IST)

Actress Hasleen Kaur from web shows CAT and the Bollywood film, Tu Jhoothi Main Makkaar, says distributors and producers need to cast actors, not just stars in films that have a theatrical release. Hasleen vies that some of the most notable names in acting, like Vikrant Massey have changed the paradigm that only stars sell films

Exclusive! barun sobti opens up about fame: I’m fine without fame

TNN / Nov 25, 2023, 11:05 (IST)

barun sobti, known for his role in Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon?, is enjoying success in the OTT space with his recent digital projects Asur 2 and Kohrra. He discusses how fame hasn't changed him and his process of choosing projects. Barun reveals that he got his first show after his friend Karan Wahi recommended him when he backed out. Initially, Barun wanted to move to Australia, but the success of Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon? made him reconsider. He admits he wasn't a good actor in the beginning but has improved over time. Barun also shares that he has a no-kissing policy on screen due to a promise he made to his wife when they were 15, although he is open to considering it if necessary.

Sanaya Irani wishes her Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon co-star barun sobti on his birthday; shares pictures from the celebration

etimes.in / Aug 22, 2023, 02:48 (IST)

barun sobti celebrated his 39th birthday on August 21. The actor was flooded with wishes from numerous celebrities, including former co-star Sanaya Irani, who posted heartfelt messages and pictures on Instagram. This birthday is particularly special for Sobti as he was recently blessed with his second child, a boy named Meer, with wife Pashmeen Manchanda in April 2023. Barun is known for his roles in TV shows, films, and web series, notably "Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon".

barun sobti is a big fan of mystery rooms, shares 'Kohhra' showrunner Sudip Sharma

ANI / Jul 19, 2023, 11:46 (IST)

Actor barun sobti continues to shine as he adds another feather to his cap with the highly anticipated thriller 'Kohrra,' following his success in 'Asur 2.' Set in Punjab, this gripping police procedural revolves around the mysterious murder of an NRI individual. The film features a talented ensemble cast including Suvinder Vicky and barun sobti as the dedicated investigating officers, with Harleen Sethi portraying Surinder's daughter and Rachel Shelley, known for her role in 'Lagaan,' taking on the role of the mother of the NRI kid's friend. Prepare for an intense and thrilling cinematic experience as 'Kohrra' delves deep into the secrets and complexities surrounding this intriguing crime.

Suvinder Vicky on 'Kohrra': Raising my hand at Harleen was most difficult

IANS / Jul 11, 2023, 12:42 (IST)

Actor Suvinder Vicky has shared the challenges he faced while portraying his character of a cop, Balbir, in the upcoming movie 'Kohrra'. The character faces confusion and struggles in his personal and professional life. Suvinder had to tap into his intense emotions to appear natural in a few demanding scenes, including a scene where he had to raise his hand at co-star Harleen Sethi. 'Kohrra' tells the story of an NRI's murder just before his wedding and releases on July 15 on OTT.

Sanaya Irani, barun sobti’s TV show Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam doon completes 12 years; the former says “It’s been 12 years of eternal love and unshakeable support”

etimes.in / Jun 06, 2023, 20:07 (IST)

Sanaya Irani gets nostalgic and emotional as her famous show Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon with barun sobti completes 12 long years. Sanaya shares that she still can't believe about getting so much love and support from her fans for her character and the lead pair Arnav and Khushi.
